duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide support in sales administration and generate sales-related reports.
Identify and quantify billing adjustments to improve work order accuracy.
Research unreported/unpaid accounts and ensure timely collection of revenue.
Undertake all aspects of credit control work, including production of reminder letters and frequent client contact.
Coordinate data collection, entering into standard and customized report formats, and generating reports.
Perform post-sales support of orders pending scheduling and billing.
